description:
Netflix subscribers are going to be inevitably disappointed by the streaming platform’s latest cancellation. It’s been revealed that Netflix has canceled a popular series after releasing three seasons on their streaming service. As a result, the upcoming third season of the series will be its last. This was confirmed in a new statement delivered by [...]

The post Netflix Cancels Series After Three Seasons appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Netflix Cancels Series After Three Seasons
